name: Indian Schools Student Transportation
objective: To provide funds to each Bureau of Indian Education (BIE) funded school for the round trip transportation of students between home and the school site.
applicant_types: Native American Organizations (includes Indian groups, cooperatives, corporations, partnerships, associations)

results.description: No Current Data Available. No Information Available.
Indian Affairs did not require this CFDA to issue new awards in FY2020.
This award funded 3 programs for student transportation

authorizations.text: Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act, Public Law 93-638, as amended, 25 U.S.C. 450 et seq.; Indian Education Amendments of 1978, Public Law 95-561, 25 U.S.C. 2001 et seq.; Tribally Controlled Schools Act, 25 U.S.C. 2501 et seq.
